column5: Grandkids are gonna make me broke going through worms at the dock. Â Cutting them up in small pieces for panfish. Anybody have a trick to keep a piece of worm on the hook?
Tiny piece of rubber tail from artificial bait.
Sock style on a baitholder hook.
I have watched sunfish pick a worm right off a hook with out even being close to the hook point. YUP The ones with the sticky points on the shank..
The best bait for kids. If fishes are really hungry small plastics might do the trick. Only way to save - grow your own :)
Wrap sewing thread around the worm. Art
Spider thread would be better, as you just rip it off.LOL  Good one Art.
